thread.title: Oscars 2017: Test Your Knowledge - The New York Times
thread.title_full: Oscars 2017: Test Your Knowledge - The New York Times

author: Mark Caro
title: Oscars 2017: Test Your Knowledge - The New York Times
text: Oscars 2017: Test Your Knowledge By MARK CARO FEB. 23, 2017 You may not be sending John Glenn into space like the heroines of the best picture nominee “Hidden Figures,” but you’ve got some other important calculations to do: solve our annual Oscars quiz. collage 1 of 15 After two straight years of all-white acting nominees, this year’s slate may be the most diverse ever. Which of the following statements is false? This is the first year with six black acting nominees. This is the first year in which every acting category includes a black performer. This is the first year to include three black actors in one category. “Moonlight” director Barry Jenkins could become the second black best-director winner. 2 of 15 Who is the only one of this year’s acting nominees to appear in two of this year’s best picture nominees? Mahershala Ali
